item.title: Cats Chain
item.description: In previous articles, I’ve talked about accumulating errors with Validated, and for that we said that we needed a Semigroup on the left side that will be used to accumulate the errors (We used a NonEmptyList[A] as an example). Today well talk about Chain and NonEmptyChain[A] and how it’s different from a List. Appending to a List requires iterating over the entire collection (linear time). So using ValidatedNel[A,B] will make us incur a heavy performance penalty specially if we traverse it.
